recipe.name: French Toast
recipe.information: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s,
recipe.ingredients: 1.5dl Milk, 1 Egg, 1 ml Salt, 4 Bread, 2 tbs butter, 1 ml cinnamon
recipe.instructions: Whisk together milk, eggs, salt, cinnamon and sugar in a bowl, Heat a frying pan with butter, Dip 4 thick slices of bread into the batter and fry them on both sides until you get a nice crispy and golden brown surface, Top your French toast with some mixed berries and a scoop of ice cream.
